QuestData.Title: Glop, Son of Glop
QuestData.Description: Glop had a son. In his grave hubris, he named it Glop. And so the line of fungalmancers continues.$B$BI require you to slay this new fungalmancer. Your shaman ally has already returned, and awaits you at his cave in the southwest of Verlok Stand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Earthmender Norsala, then kill Fungalmancer Glop.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps one day, we shall slay these stone troggs more swiftly than they can breed, and in so doing, end the line of fungalmancers forever.$B$BIn time.
